notes: This creature can trigger [[Goshnar's Taints]], which means it can teleport to players, recover its life instead of dying, etc. This creature can also hit [[Critical Hits|critical attacks]].
sounds: You have been chosen for a harvest!
name: Dreadful Harvester
location: All the boss rooms of the [[Soul War Quest]].
strategy: All players should use [[Stone Skin Amulet]]s and [[Might Ring]]s when facing these creatures, their critical hits can be brutal and kill even high level mages in one shot. Shooters should never stand still blocking them and must be moving all the time during the boss fights to avoid their damage.
